summary: An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of Boyer Avenue from the north and west lines of Interlaken, an addition to the City of Seattle, to the east margin of 15th Avenue North; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor and providing that the cost of said improvement shall be paid by special assessment upon the property specially benefited in the manner provided by law.
